## Variables

<table><thead><tr><th>

Variable


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[CATEGORY\_NAME](./blockly.variablesdynamic_namespace.category_name_variable.md)


</td><td>

String for use in the "custom" attribute of a category in toolbox XML. This string indicates that the category should be dynamically populated with variable blocks. See also Blockly.Variables.CATEGORY\_NAME and Blockly.Procedures.CATEGORY\_NAME.


</td></tr>
